title: I have a Question for Riot
body: So, I've been leveling up a smurf account so it could be my Thresh main account. I was planning to just have Thresh so I could open the Hextech chest and get a skin for Thresh from it. The problem is, I just got Kayle and Riot Kayle from the congratulating 10 years. Is it possible for me to just get a skin for Thresh and not Kayle? I've been working so hard to get a skin for Thresh. It's been weeks. I don't want it to be ruined by just getting Kayle.

replies.body:
The Anniversary gifts are not something that can be exchanged for other content. If you'd like to remove Kayle from your account, you can reach out to our support team in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) after the 23rd.

I also wanted to mention that [Hextech Crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) loot is completely random, so even if you only own Thresh, you'll very likely get content that is not a Thresh skin out of hextech boxes.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Well, I opened it. It was my first Hextech chest, so it gave me a skin of the champs I had. It gave me a Kayle skin :(. I don't know if you could refund it now, but it would be great if you could!!

Unfortunately, Hextech content (like chests) cannot be refunded, as per our [*refund policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I hate this
I spent a month
Trying to get enough IP
And then I get a KAYLE SKIN
